params._data: RLP encoded executer address and bytes data. This is re-encoded tx.data from 1Inch swap API
params._fromAsset: The token address of the asset being sold by the vault.
params._fromAssetAmount: The amount of assets being sold by the vault.
params._minToAssetAmount: The minimum amount of assets to be purchased.
params._toAsset: The token address of the asset being purchased by the vault.

SWAP_ROUTER().notice: 1Inch router contract to give allowance to perform swaps

swap(address,address,uint256,uint256,byt.notice: Strategist swaps assets sitting in the contract of the `assetHolder`.
